\p3Let's make sure we're all geared up,

This quaint village started out as a
small colony owned by Solus Town.
As the years passed, it became more independant, stocking
up many valuable resources and owning a lot of land.
Eventually, Solus Town realized it'd be better as
a whole to allow the colony to be independant.
And so, the colony was dubbed Solus Valley!
The stores here provide many nature-related items,
and the townspeople are very friendly.
you to come get me or anything, right?
